activities: Kimball International, Inc. and its wholly owned subsidiaries may receive personal information in the form of resume content submitted by individuals interested in seeking employment with Kimball via the Kimball website, email, regular mail, and other sources, and also may receive personal information belonging to  employees of third-party vendors supplying services to Kimball International, Inc.
recoursemech: Relevant European data protection authorities (EU DPAs) for human resources information transferred from the EU for use in the context of employment relationships.  American Arbitration Association (AAA) (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program) for all other personal information.
